pkgmetadata.longdescription: ==Biblioteca geradora de cmpkg==This library allows the generation of Colibri Master Packages, also known as extensions CMPKG.===Main versions released ==2.2.0.1- Support only for Python 3.11 or above.2.0.0.1- Support removed for super "packages";- Provide errors when executables doesn't meet certain patterns.1.0.2.0- Encoding fixed.1.0.0.0- Support to embed multiple database scripts sets.
